sections.Description:
Agasa gave these highly useful watches to the Detective Boys to help light up dark places. Agasa also added the flashlight function to Conan'sStun-Gun Wristwatch. The Wristwatch Flashlight even works underwater.
Inthe showdown between Makoto and Kaitou Kid, Conan's wristwatch had a blacklight modification added.
sections.Usage:
They are usually used in place of flashlights but they can be used for other purposes:
- In the Clockwork case to reveal the culprit trick by having Inspector Megure wear it while he was playing the victim in place of the necklace the victim was wearing that had luminal paint which the culprit used to find her in the dark.
- In the Trapped at Hatoyama Farm case Ai’s was used in order to make a pseudo black light.
